lifecycle.usageRule: Use React Aria Select anatomy with Titan tokens; use titan-aria wrappers when they avoid rework.
lifecycle.migrationTrigger: Normalize temporary snowflake variants to this Aria/token contract.

select.description: Select (bot√≥n + popover + lista de opciones). Estructura React Aria: Select, SelectValue, Button (trigger), Popover, ListBox, ListBoxItem.
select.aria: Select + SelectValue + Button[data-slot=trigger] + Popover[data-slot=listbox] + ListBox + ListBoxItem (react-aria-components).
reviewScenarios: Show closed trigger states and open list item states in a single review harness.
Demonstrate selected item persistence after close/reopen.
Demonstrate disabled trigger and disabled item behavior.
Demonstrate keyboard open, arrow navigation, and Enter selection.
a11yAcceptance: Trigger is labeled and keyboard operable.
Listbox items expose selected and disabled semantics.
Focus remains visible on trigger and option navigation.
Escape closes popover and returns focus to trigger.

fail: Missing required visible states for trigger or list items.
Disabled and selected states are visually indistinguishable.
Keyboard navigation does not update focused option.
blocker: Select cannot render trigger + popover + listbox anatomy.
Missing semantic tokens required for focused/pressed/selected/disabled list item states.
